Package org.cesecore.certificates.ca

Interface CvcPlugin

  • public interface CvcPlugin
    CvcPlugin is an interface for CVC CA implementation. There can be different types of CVCCAs.
    Version:
    $Id: CvcPlugin.java 27346 2017-11-28 16:14:30Z samuellb $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      String getCvcType()  

    • Method Detail

      • getCvcType

        String getCvcType()

      • createRequest

        byte[] createRequest​(CryptoToken cryptoToken,
                     Collection<org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Encodable> attributes,
                     String signAlg,
                     Certificate cacert,
                     int signatureKeyPurpose,
                     CertificateProfile certificateProfile,
                     AvailableCustomCertificateExtensionsConfiguration cceConfig)
              throws CryptoTokenOfflineException,
                     CertificateExtensionException
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - Token
        attributes - Attrs
        signAlg - Algorithm
        cacert - CA Certificate
        signatureKeyPurpose - Purpose
        certificateProfile - Profile
        cceConfig - Config
        Returns:
        Request
        Throws:
        CryptoTokenOfflineException - if offline
        CertificateExtensionException - if certificate has invalid extensions
        See Also:
        CA.createRequest(CryptoToken, Collection, String, Certificate, int, CertificateProfile, AvailableCustomCertificateExtensionsConfiguration)

                                EndEntityInformation subject,
                                RequestMessage request,
                                PublicKey publicKey,
                                int keyusage,
                                Date notBefore,
                                Date notAfter,
                                CertificateProfile certProfile,
                                org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Extensions extensions,
                                String sequence,
                                AvailableCustomCertificateExtensionsConfiguration cceConfig)
                         throws Exception
        Parameters:
        cryptoToken - Token
        subject - Subject
        request - Request
        publicKey - Public key
        keyusage - Usage
        notBefore - start date
        notAfter - End date
        certProfile - Profile
        extensions - extensions
        sequence - sequence
        cceConfig - config
        Returns:
        certificate
        Throws:
        Exception - on error
        See Also:
